description: Shih Erh (Biao Yuen), a Taoist monk disciple, takes in a scholar named Tsui Hung-Chuen (Lawrence Ng) after he inadvertently burned down his house after battling a demon. Shih Erh and his master Wu Men-Chu (Ma Wu) house and attempt...
keywords: kung fu,sword fight,ghost,sword and sorcery,martial arts
name: Hua zhong xian

review.name: They choose the wrong main character
review.reviewBody: Picture of a nymph is a average ghost story with the same premise of A Chinese Ghost Story.It predicable but well made enough to worth a watch if you into this kind of stuff.The biggest mistake the movie made is not focus on Biao Yuen character but instead a whiny scholar guy with a very punchable face.The guy seriously ruin every scene in the movie by having his face on the set
